greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations of [n] with exactly n (possibly overlapping) occurrences of the generalized pattern 13-2 (alternatively: 2-13, 2-31, or 31-2).
comment: Also number of permutations of [n] with n nestings; also number of permutations of [n] with n crossings.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 31 2017
